posts.post_content:
I'm going to love throwing this down with a [mimic vat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mimic vat) on the board.   
At first glance, this is my favorite card from the entire set.  
   
edit: @ LiXinjian  
if Murdershot21's opponent cast vines in response to the skinrender, it would resolve before skinrender comes into play. the target of skinrenders ability wouldn't have been chosen yet.   
if vines was cast in response to skinrenders ability going on the stack, then you would be right.

Posted By: Dabok (7/27/2012 3:54:09 AM)

posts.post_content: This particular Creature enters the battlefield bursting through the chest of target creature (hence the -3/-3). Some argue it's not a creature but if it originated from another creature's vital organs it still counts as having been mutated into a separate lifeform (so it could in fact be a Zombified creature of what originally used to be the target creature's vital organs). The MTG software @ games could stimulate this effect by making this card enter the game literally ripping through target creature card in play (just don't do it in a real game with real cards - unless you have a replacement) :p
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
5 stars for such a great creature. He is an auto-include in all zombie decks, and his ETB ability is absolutely terrific for gaining control of creature battles. The best part about it is that they are -1/-1 counters, so even if he can't kill it, he can still permanently weaken it.  
  
Awesome, fantastic creature, the best I've seen in a long time.
posts.html:

Awesome, fantastic creature, the best I've seen in a long time.
